name: Clutter Collectors
description:
26DEC2022 -

- More bug fixes!

25DEC2022 - 

- Fixed a bug that prevented the truck from spawning if restarting from the main menu.

- Fixed a bug that prevents player from accessing the last level.

- Fixed a bug that prevented items from spawning in succeeding levels.

Controls ----------------

LMB - Tosses items towards the donation truck!

RMB - Tosses items off the ramp and into the snow!

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome home! While you're on winter break, you might consider helping your neighbors clean up some clutter! Made for Mini Jam 122!

Feedback always welcome, and thanks for playing!
